Trigger A creature within your reach critically fails to Strike you.

Requirements You are benefiting from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Twin Parry].

A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon. Make a melee Strike or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm] action against the triggering opponent.
